title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database in the Available Items sector, the column icons do not show up.
EB: In the Available Items sector, when expanding the Data Source by clicking the related icon, the table icons and column icons should show up.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application and go to the Available Items sector.
2. Connect to a Derby database.
3. Expand the Data Source by clicking the related icon.
4. Check if the table icons and column icons are displayed properly.
